summary: This document is an email chain between US Attorney's Office (SDNY) personnel discussing the preparation of a sharing order application for Epstein estate documents, specifically wills and trusts. The correspondence focuses on ensuring the order accurately describes the materials received, including references to a '2019 Trust' and 'Trust Two', and notes the absence of revocation documents.
keyFacts: The US Attorney's Office (SDNY) was preparing a sharing order application for Epstein estate documents, including wills and trusts.
The correspondence notes the absence of 'Trust Two' documents in any will and questions references to a '2019 Trust' without corresponding documents.
The email chain highlights coordination among legal staff to ensure accurate characterization of estate materials for sharing purposes.
